label: 譜代大名
本: Edo and Paris:  Urban Life and the State in the Early Modern Era . Cornell University Press . 1994
著者: McClain, James L.  and Wakita Osamu
説明文: A daimyo who was elevated to that status by the Tokugawa family or who, as an independent lord, allied himself with leyasu before the battle of Sekigahara. [徳川、家康、関ヶ原]
